response.overview: Brainy Baby is university studied and published in JOCAM Journal of Children and Media. Parents tell us their children love to watch them again and again learning something new each time. Interactive Infant Early Learning DVD features live action and real children while using familiar objects to help make fast learning connections. DVD enhances Right Brain development exposing children to Classical Music, Gentle Voices while exploring Creative Thinking, Art, Drawing, Rhymes, Imaginative Images and more. The Right Brain DVD works with the Left Brain DVD which exposes children to logical types of images and activities which stimulate whole brain development.
response.tagline: Brainy Baby Right Brain: Creative Thinking Infant Brain Development
response.title: Brainy Baby: Right Brain
